i1.name: Prowl
description:
{{sbc|Innate - Prowl:}} While in {{tip|brush}}, '''Nidalee''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|1400 range}} {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champion}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Hunt:}} Hitting {{tip|monster|monsters}} or enemy champions with ''{{ai|Javelin Toss|Nidalee}}'', or ''{{ai|Bushwhack|Nidalee}}'' while they are {{tt|nearby|3000 range}}, will apply a ''Hunted'' mark and {{tip|true sight|reveal}} them for 4 seconds. During this time, '''Nidalee''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|5500 range}} ''Hunted'' target. Additionally, '''Nidalee's''' first use of ''{{ai|Takedown|Nidalee}}'' and ''{{ai|Pounce|Nidalee}}'' against ''Hunted'' targets are empowered.
The {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} from ''Prowl'' and ''Hunt'' can stack, but cannot exceed {{as|30%|ms}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Prowl: While in brush, Nidalee gains 10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, increased to 30% when facing a nearby visible enemy champion.

Innate - Hunt: Hitting monsters or enemy champions with Nidalee's Javelin Toss, or Nidalee's Bushwhack while they are nearby, will apply a Hunted mark and reveal them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% when facing a nearby Hunted target. Additionally, Nidalee's first use of Nidalee's Takedown and Nidalee's Pounce against Hunted targets are empowered.
The bonus movement speed from Prowl and Hunt can stack, but cannot exceed 30%.
i1.notes: * {{ai|Bushwhack|Nidalee}} {{tip|true sight|reveals}} the target for 4 seconds even while '''Nidalee''' is not nearby.

q1.name: Javelin_Toss
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' hurls a javelin in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit, increased by {{pp|type=distance traveled|key=%|0 to 200 for 6|525 to 1300}}.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Nidalee hurls a javelin in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased by 525 to 1300 â€’ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 150}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|210 to 450}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Maximum Magic Damage: (+ 150% AP)

q2.name: Takedown
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee's''' next [[basic attack]] within 10 seconds has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, gains {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' range}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}} that is increased by an amount for every {{as|1% of target's '''missing''' health}}. The minimum damage can also be applied against {{tip|turrets}}.
{{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl|Nidalee|Hunt}}'' Bonus:}} A ''Hunted'' target hit will take {{ccs|40% increased damage|magic}}.

''Takedown'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Nidalee's''' basic attack timer. Other damage converted to {{as|magic damage}} by ''Takedown'' are not increased by ''Takedown's'' respective effects.
q2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nidalee's next basic attack within 10 seconds has an uncancellable windup, gains 75 bonus range and is modified to deal magic damage that is increased by an amount for every 1% of target's missing health. The minimum damage can also be applied against turrets.
Nidalee's Hunt Bonus: A Hunted target hit will take Unknown value: ccs / 40% increased damage / magic.
Takedown resets Nidalee's basic attack timer. Other damage converted to magic damage by Takedown are not increased by Takedown's respective effects.
q2.notes:
* ''Takedown's'' attack deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* Increased damage to ''{{ai|Prowl|Nidalee|Hunted}}'' targets is displayed as a {{ccs|cosmetic critical strike|magic|tip=false|link=true}}: Unless '''Nidalee''' has critical strike chance and the attack rolled a {{tip|critical strike}} naturally, it is unaffected by critical damage modifiers.
* {{tip|basic attack|Basic attacks}} enhanced by ''Takedown'' convert {{nie|Spellblade}} damage from physical to magic, if it was not already magic. Their damage is however not increased by ''Takedown''.
* ''Takedown's'' damage will apply {{stil|life steal}}.
* {{pending for test}} - Parry interactions ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}}).

effects.str:
Nidalee's Takedown scales with Nidalee's Aspect of the Cougar rank
  • Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 75% AD) (+ 40% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ % AD) (+ % AP)
  • Bonus Damage: %
  • Maximum Bonus Damage: %

st_slices: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ % AD) (+ % AP)

effects.str:
• Nidalee's Prowl-Enhanced Minimum Damage: (+ % AD) (+ % AP)
  • Nidalee's Prowl-Enhanced Maximum Damage: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ % AD) (+ % AP)

st_slices: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ % AD) (+ % AP)

w1.name: Bushwhack
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' lays a trap at the target location that becomes {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed}} after arming over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, lasting for up to 120 seconds and granting {{tip|sight}} within its radius. The trap will spring upon contact with an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} per second over 4 seconds.

Traps have {{as|{{sti|health|6 '''maximum''' health}}}} and can only be damaged by champion [[basic attacks]] (2 hit points from {{tip|ranged}} and 3 hit points from {{tip|melee}}). Up to a maximum of {{pp|4 to 10 for 4|1 to 16}} traps may be active at once.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nidalee lays a trap at the target location that becomes stealthed after arming over 1.5 seconds, lasting for up to 120 seconds and granting sight within its radius. The trap will spring upon contact with an enemy, dealing magic damage per second over 4 seconds.
Traps have 6 maximum health and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 hit points from ranged and 3 hit points from melee). Up to a maximum of 1 to 16 â€’ undefined traps may be active at once.
See Nidalee/LoL#Pets for more details about traps.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|10*4 to 50*4}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 5% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 20% AP)

w2.name: Pounce
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} [[Kill]]ing an enemy while in ''Cougar Form'' or using ''Pounce's'' ''Hunt'' bonus {{sti|reduces}} ''Pounce's'' remaining cooldown to a minimum value.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies upon arrival.

{{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl|Nidalee|Hunted}}'' Bonus:}} '''Nidalee''' can perform ''Pounce'' from an increased range on a ''Hunted'' enemy closest to the cursor. '''Nidalee''' can ''Pounce'' to a target location near a ''Hunted'' enemy if she is close to the ''Hunted'' enemy.
''Pounce will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
w2.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Killing an enemy while in Cougar Form or using Pounce's Hunt bonus reduces Pounce's remaining cooldown to a minimum value.
Active: Nidalee dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies upon arrival.
Nidalee's Hunted Bonus: Nidalee can perform Pounce from an increased range on a Hunted enemy closest to the cursor. Nidalee can Pounce to a target location near a Hunted enemy if she is close to the Hunted enemy.
Pounce will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling:
{{sbc|''{{ai|Pounce|Nidalee}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar|Nidalee}}'' rank}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 210 4}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
w2.notes:
* '''Pounce''' will not receive the reduced cooldown if the target becomes ''Hunted'' mid-air.
* '''Pounce''' without a '''Hunted''' target will have a fixed distance and use [[Direction-targeted|direction-targeting]].
* '''Pounce''' in the direction of a '''Hunted''' target that is inside of normal ability range will use [[Location-targeted|location-targeting]] and place '''Nidalee''' at the target location.
* '''Pounce''' on a '''Hunted''' target that is out of normal ability range will use [[Unit-targeted|unit-targeting]] and place '''Nidalee''' on the side of the target that the target is facing.

effects.str: • Reduced Cooldown:

Nidalee's Pounce scales with Nidalee's Aspect of the Cougar rank
  • Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

e1.name: Primal_Surge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' revitalizes herself or the target allied champion, granting {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds and {{tip|healing}} the target for an amount that is increased by {{as|{{pp|label1=target's '''missing''' health|label=Heal increase|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|key1=%|0 to 95|formula=1% per 0.95% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Nidalee revitalizes herself or the target allied champion, granting bonus attack speed for 7 seconds and healing the target for an amount that is increased by 0 to 95 â€’ undefined.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 60}}%}}
{{st|Minimum Heal|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ {{fd|27.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Heal|{{ap|35*2 to 95*2}} {{as|(+ 55% AP)}}}}
e1.notes: * The {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} will persist through {{ai|Aspect of the Cougar 2|Nidalee|Cougar Form}} if '''Nidalee''' uses ''Primal Surge'' on herself.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Minimum Heal: (+ 27.5% AP)
  • Maximum Heal: (+ 55% AP)

e2.name: Swipe
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' slashes in an arc in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
e2.descriptionHtml: Active: Nidalee slashes in an arc in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
leveling:
{{sbc|''{{ai|Swipe|Nidalee}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar|Nidalee}}'' rank}}

effects.str:
Nidalee's Swipe scales with Nidalee's Aspect of the Cougar rank
  • Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)

r1.name: Aspect_of_the_Cougar
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' switches between her '''Human Form''' and '''Cougar Form'''.
{{sbc|Cougar Form:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms into a cougar, gaining {{tip|melee}} attacks with {{sti|range|125 range}} and access to her cougar abilities.

{{sbc|Human Form:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms into a human, gaining {{tip|ranged}} attacks with 525 {{sti|range}} and access to her human abilities. While in '''Human Form''', applying a ''{{ai|Prowl|Nidalee|Hunted}}'' mark will {{sti|cdr|reset}} ''Aspect of the Cougar's'' cooldown.
'''Nidalee''' begins with one rank in ''Aspect of the Cougar'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16. '''Cougar Form's''' abilities scale based on ''Aspect of the Cougar's'' rank.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nidalee switches between her Human Form and Cougar Form.
Cougar Form: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining melee attacks with 125 range and access to her cougar abilities.
Human Form: Nidalee transforms into a human, gaining ranged attacks with 525 range and access to her human abilities. While in Human Form, applying a Nidalee's Hunted mark will reset Aspect of the Cougar's cooldown.
Nidalee begins with one rank in Aspect of the Cougar and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16. Cougar Form's abilities scale based on Aspect of the Cougar's rank.
r1.notes: *Transformations do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
